UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the system.

id.description: The unique identifier for the user, matching the Firebase Auth UID.

role.description: The user's role in the platform.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user profile was created.

avatarUrl.description: URL for the user's avatar image.

bannerUrl.description: URL for the user's profile banner image.

ProfessionalDetails.title: Professional Details
ProfessionalDetails.description: Additional details for users with the 'professional' role.

bio.description: A short biography of the professional.

reviews.description: The total number of reviews received.

Service.title: Service
Service.description: Represents a service offered by a professional.

professionalId.description: The UID of the professional offering the service.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public and private information for each user.

/services/{serviceId}.description: Stores all services offered on the platform.
